item.title: TV Technica 2022: These were our favorite shows and binges of the year
item.description: TV Technica 2022: These were our favorite shows and binges of the year Streamers dominated original programming in 2022, but the 2023 forecast is cloudy.

item.title: Bigg Boss 16: Shalin Bhanot's ex-wife Dalljiet Kaur pens heartfelt note after he breaks down reading family's letter
item.description: Bigg Boss 16: Shalin Bhanot’s ex-wife Dalljiet Kaur pens heartfelt note after he breaks down reading family’s letter 'Bigg Boss 16' contestant Shalin Bhanot's former wife and actress Dalljiet Kaur has penned a heartfelt note for the actor after seeing a video of him tearing up after seeing a letter he got from his family in the show.

item.title: Bigg Boss 16 : सलमान की डांट के बाद अर्चना ने उठाया ये कदम, टास्क से सामने आई टीना की ये सच्चाई!
